title: Mariano Rajoy - Wikipedia
snippet: Mariano Rajoy Brey (Galician: [maɾiˈanʊ raˈʃoj], Spanish: [maˈɾjano raˈxoj]; born 27 March 1955) is a Spanish politician who served as Prime Minister of Spain from 2011 to 2018. A member of the People's Party, he served as the party's president from 2004 to 2018.

title: Mariano Rajoy | Facts & Biography | Britannica
snippet: Mariano Rajoy, Spanish politician who served as prime minister of Spain from 2011 to 2018. He took office amid the European debt crisis and implemented harsh but effective austerity measures.

title: Premiership of Mariano Rajoy - Wikipedia
snippet: The premiership of Mariano Rajoy over Spain spanned from 2011 to 2018. Mariano Rajoy became Prime Minister of Spain on 20 December 2011, after his People's Party's (PP) landslide victory in the 2011 general election.

title: Mariano Rajoy former President of Spain (2011 to 2018).
snippet: Mariano Rajoy former President of the Government of Spain (2011-2018), Full Members of Club Madrid.

title: Mariano Rajoy | Historica Wiki | Fandom
snippet: Mariano Rajoy (born 27 March 1955) was Prime Minister of Spain from 20 December 2011 to 1 June 2018, succeeding Jose Luis Rodriguez Zapatero and preceding Pedro Sanchez. Leader of the People's Party of Spain from 2004, he was forced to resign ...
